page.title: 16SHOPPING IN WEST CAMBS.
page.content:
The only shop in the area is the small farm shop at Catworth Fruit Farm, which offers a selection of fruit and vegetables. Stow Longa has no shop, but a mobile greengrocer's shop visits the village weekly, and the fish and chip van, which calls on Saturdays, is also well patronised.
There are regular deliveries of meat and milk, except to the residents of Little Catworth, who have nothing but a monthly visit from a freezer van.
Kimbolton, three kilometres to the South, offers more extensive shopping facilities, but many people prefer to shop at supermarkets and stores in the larger towns, where they can obtain a wider range of goods at lower prices.
